title: gMed and Modernizing Medicine Showcase Best-of-Breed EMR Systems at ACG 2015
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Modernizing Medicine, Inc. 
BOCA RATON, Fla. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- gMed , developer of the gGastro electronic medical record (EMR) system and gGastro’s endoscopy report writer,and Modernizing Medicine, Inc. , the creator of the cloud-based, specialty-specific Electronic Medical Assistant ® (EMA™) platform and EMA Gastroenterology™, will showcase their GI-specific systems at this year’s American College of Gastroenterology Annual Scientific Meeting (ACG 2015) in Honolulu, HI. 
“We blended two amazing teams to further our mission of improving outcomes and modernizing medicine,” shares Daniel Cane, CEO and co-founder of Modernizing Medicine. “ACG 2015 is the first step to showing our collective software and services to the gastroenterology community.” 
Modernizing Medicine will support the efforts of gMed, the gastroenterology electronic health record (EHR) system market leader acquired in September 2015. The 18-year-old company’s gGastro EHR system has earned Black Book Rankings’ award for Top Ambulatory EHR for gastroenterology for five consecutive years, and combined with gPM, gMed’s integrated practice management system, offers a complete gastro-specific suite. gMed will also be demonstrating gGastro’s endoscopy report writer which was chosen by Olympus as a preferred replacement for its EndoWorks platform which is being discontinued. 
“Being handpicked by Olympus to be only one of two select vendors to provide software to current EndoWorks and future Olympus customers is an honor,” states Joe Rubinsztain, MD, president of gMed. “We look forward to showing our gGastro Suite and data-driven gastroenterology-specific solutions to ACG attendees.” 
Built by practicing gastroenterologists, EMA Gastroenterology is pre-coded with gastroenterology-specific medical knowledge and knows the workflow of physicians in this specialty. The intuitive solution is available as a native iPad application and can be accessed via the Internet virtually anywhere and anytime. EMA Gastroenterology’s structured data collection, combined with a user-friendly touch-screen interface and automated ICD-10 capabilities, gives providers the technology they need to efficiently run their practices and the comfort of knowing that charting, coding and billing can be completed before they leave the exam room. 
“At this year’s ACG we are pleased to showcase our built in ICD-10 solution which has received rave reviews from clients. They appreciate that the new, more complicated coding is completed simultaneously along with the exam note, saving them time,” said Dr. Julie C. Servoss, EMA Gastroenterology Medical Director at Modernizing Medicine. “In addition, physicians utilizing our new Protocols solution can customize their workflow and develop their own master visits. EMA already includes intuitive adaptive learning, and now with only two clicks a physician can pull the master visit into the current visit to quickly document while seeing a patient.” 
Dr. Servoss and EMA Gastroenterology Team Lead Dr. Elliot Ellis will be at booth #1219 demoing EMA Gastroenterology and showcasing all of the specialty-specific attributes and features available. Attendees can see gMed’s award winning gGastro Suite and Endoscopy Report Writer at booth #932. ACG 2015 is taking place at the Hawaii Convention Center in Honolulu, HI, from October 18 – 20, 2015. You can learn more about the conference here . 
About Modernizing Medicine Modernizing Medicine® is transforming how healthcare information is created, consumed and utilized in order to increase efficiency and improve outcomes. Our flagship product, Electronic Medical Assistant® (EMA™), is a cloud-based, specialty-specific electronic medical records (EMR) system built by practicing physicians. Available as a native iPad application and from almost any web-enabled Mac or PC, EMA adapts to each provider’s unique style of practice. This ICD-10 ready EMR system is available for the dermatology, ophthalmology, orthopedics, otolaryngology, gastroenterology, urology and plastic surgery markets and used by over 9,000 providers in the United States and its territories. The Modernizing Medicine family of companies also provides specialty-specific billing and inventory management, plus gastroenterology products and services that includes an EMR system, Endoscopy Report Writer, practice management solution, patient portal, data analytics and revenue cycle management. Follow Modernizing Medicine on Twitter at www.modmed.com/twitter and on Facebook at www.modmed.com/facebook . 
About gMed gMed, a Modernizing Medicine company, provides the gastroenterology industry with a fully integrated platform consisting of an electronic health record system, Endoscopy Report Writer, practice management solution, patient portal, data analytics and revenue cycle management services.
